title: Youkai Watch: Shadow Side
title_japanese: 妖怪ウォッチ シャドウサイド
synopsis: Taking place after the events of the fourth film, the series centers on 11 yr old Keisuke Amano, Natsume's younger brother (both of whom are the children of Keita Amano and Fumika Kodama of the original Youkai Watch anime) who doesn't believe in any supernatural phenomenon around him. But as he notices his sister is frequently comes back home late, he decided to stalk her, only to find out she is doing her duties exorcising evil Youkai alongside her friends Touma and Akinori, and running a Yo-Kai detective agency. With their secret revealed to him, Natsume decided to let him tag along in her activities as they investigate Youkai crimes and take on evil Youkai to maintain peace all over the city. (Source: Wiki)

Prequel.name: Youkai Watch Movie 4: Shadow Side - Oni-ou no Fukkatsu

opening_themes: #2: "Susume Shounen! Hyuuihyuu (進め少年！ヒューイヒュー)" by Hard Birds (eps 27-)
ending_themes: #1: "Funky Boogie Bar (ファンキー・ブギブバー)" by King Cream Soda (eps 1-26)
#2: "Oyasumi Sanka (お休み賛歌)" by King Cream Soda (eps 27-)
